FuncDef:
The ntp-service disable command disables IPv4 NTP services.
The undo ntp-service disable command enables IPv4 NTP services.
By default, NTP services are enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To disable NTP services, run this disable command in the system view.
NTP service disabling will not delete the existing configurations.
This command applies to the following scenarios:
The device clock does not need to be synchronized with the clock of the external server or peer.The device does not need to provide any reference clock source for an external client.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
